articles.content: The Last of Us 2 hack has sent shockwaves through gaming, as one of the year's biggest games has had its story, gameplay, and secrets shared across the internet. Forums, social media, and comment sections have been filled with messages about the game's plot, … [+4680 chars]

articles.title: Behold: the new Lamborghini Huracán Evo RWD Spyder - Top Gear
articles.description: Slower, lighter Lambo brings the noise, and the skids
articles.content:
Lamborghini is very much open for business. Quite literally. Here, we present the Huracán Evo Rear-Wheel Drive Spyder; an open-top version of a car were rather fond of.
That car being the Evo RWD Coupe we tested very recently. This Spyder promises the same p… [+1988 chars]

articles.title: Riot formally commits to tackling toxic behavior in Valorant - Eurogamer.net
articles.content:
Last month, several Valorant devs came forward to report experiencing sexist harassment within their own game - and after some promises were made on Twitter, Riot has now formalised its commitment to tackling the problem.

articles.title: Bad news for Samsung Galaxy S8 users - why it's time to switch to the Galaxy S10 or S20 - Express
articles.description: SAMSUNG Galaxy S8 owners have been used to getting regular software updates from the Korean technology firm but that's just changed and it might be time to upgrade to something new.

articles.title: EA's Upcoming Games Can Be "Upgraded Free" for Next-Gen Consoles - Kotaku UK
articles.description: A good way to save on FIFA 21.

articles.title: LG’s stylish mid-range Velvet smartphone gets its grand reveal - The Verge
articles.description: LG’s mid-range Velvet has been officially announced, following weeks of teases and announcements. The device features a “raindrop” triple rear camera array with a 48 megapixel main camera, and a 6.8-inch OLED display.
articles.content:
English-language announcement coming later this month 
Image: LG
The LG Velvet has finally officially launched in South Korea, following weeks of teases and announcements. As expected, the phone features a raindrop triple rear camera array, is powered by a … [+1641 chars]

articles.author: Simon Sharwood
articles.title: Australian contact-tracing app sent no data to contact-tracers for at least ten days after hurried launch - The Register
articles.description: Doesn't play well on iPhones, but bureaucrats rushed it out rather than wait months for perfection. Meanwhile serious bug reports have emerged
articles.content: Australias COVIDSafe contact-tracing app was rushed to market in the knowledge it would perform poorly on some devices and without agreements in place to let actual contact-tracers use the data it collects. As a result, no collected data has been used in at l… [+5502 chars]
